title: Bug 2694Editor Selection Dialog: UI suggestions (1GI6RPE)
description: Bug 2694Editor Selection Dialog: UI suggestions (1GI6RPE) press Add for the associated editors. Multiple selection could be enabled. The default entry in the associated editors list could be marked (default) (see perspectives). NOTES: KLM (10/10/2001 1:54:57 PM) Also: Need a width hint for the dialog. Why does the File editors Pref page grow in height when it is selected, but no other pages do the same? I currently have fixes for a, c, f. Need to release. KLM (10/10/2001 5:58:58 PM) released fixes for a, c, f, g
OB: When there is no selection, the OK button is enabled.
SR:
To reproduce the issue: 
1. Go to the preference page and select 'WorkbenchFile Editors'.
2. Without selecting anything from the 'Internal Editors', navigate to 'External Editors' and select an entry.
3. Switch back to 'Internal Editors'. Still, no selection will be observed.
4. Press the OK button. This will add the selected external editor.
